links.title: Discover the latest updates
links.content:
[![Nukkleus](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/logo.svg)](/)

  * [![LinkedIn](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/social-linkedin.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nukkleus/)
  * [![Twitter](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/social-twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/NukkleusInc)



# Nukkleus Latest News

[ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/10.png) 29.12.2023 Nukkleus Inc. shares corporate presentation  A GATEWAY TO THE FUTURE OF FINANCE ‚Äì 99.3 NUKK FINAL DECK ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-shares-corporate-presentation/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/5.png) 04.05.2022 Nukkleus Inc. completes rebrand to a Blockchain and FinTech business Nukkleus Inc. launches its new website and brand design. Under the new brand and website, the firm‚Äôs subsidiary brands will be united under one suite of assets. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-completes-rebrand-to-a-blockchain-and-fintech-business/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/1.png) 23.02.2022 Nukkleus, Inc. to combine with Brilliant Acquisition Corp. Nukkleus, Inc. announces the signing of a merger agreement for a proposed business combination with Brilliant Acquisition Corp, a publicly-traded special purpose acquisition company formed in the British Virgin Islands. The transaction values the Company at an enterprise value of approximately $140 million. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-to-combine-with-brilliant-acquisition-corp/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/2.png) 21.10.2021 Nukkleus Inc. Acquires Stake in New Bitcoin ETF Issuer, Jacobi Asset Management Crypto payments specialist Nukkleus Inc, formally acquires a 5% interest (for an eight figure sum) in Jacobi Asset Management Limited (Jacobi), a company focused on digital asset management that has received regulatory approval to launch the world‚Äôs first tier one Bitcoin ETF. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-acquires-stake-in-new-bitcoin-etf-issuer-jacobi-asset-management/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/15-1.png) 20.09.2021 Polygon and Nukkleus to support Bollant Industries, revolutioniz-ing municipal waste recycling Crypto payments specialist Nukkleus Inc, will work in collaboration with Polygon and Grassroots Economics to deliver a Blockchain community grant to Bollant Industries in Hyderabad, India. The grant will support the development of a blockchain solution to improve the waste management supply chain. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/polygon-and-nukkleus-to-support-bollant-industries-revolutioniz-ing-municipal-waste-recycling/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 14.09.2021 Nukkleus announces exclusive partnership with Monogram blockchain to facilitate payments for MG Token Nukkleus Inc. has partnered with Monogram Network, a leading public ledger blockchain, supporting the issuance of their MG Token. This exclusive partnership via crypto firm Digital RFQ Limited is another step forward in providing institutional investors with the security they need to enter the crypto market and benefit from the performance of digital assets and crypto payments. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-announces-exclusive-partnership-with-monogram-blockchain-to-facilitate-payments-for-mg-token/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 12.07.2021 Nukkleus seeks UK EMI license to expand Crypto-powered service offerings Nukkleus, Inc. is announcing the submission of an application to the UK‚Äôs Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) for an Electronic Money Institution (license). The license, if granted, would enable Nukkleus to provide seamless crypto conversions of regulated fiat money transfers within traditional banking infrastructure. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-seeks-uk-emi-license-to-expand-crypto-powered-service-offerings/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 09.06.2021 Nukkleus Inc. acquires London-based Match Financial Limited Nukkleus, Inc, a leading software and technology solutions firm, is proud to announce the acquisition of Match Financial Limited, a London-based financial services firm that wholly owns Digital RFQ Limited. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-acquires-london-based-match-financial-limited/)

links.title: Resources
links.content:
[![Nukkleus](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/logo.svg)](/)

  * [![Twitter](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/social-twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/NukkleusInc)



# Nukkleus Resources

[ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/7.png) As the old meets the new, how can traditional banks ensure compliance in the world of fintech? It‚Äôs essential that customers of financial institutions save themselves time, find ways to be more efficient and convenient, but also feel entirely secure. This demand has seen a need for faster adoption of new technologies such as fintech, in order to satisfy their customer base. With the pressure being put onto heavily regulated traditional banks, [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/as-the-old-meets-the-new-how-can-traditional-banks-ensure-compliance-in-the-world-of-fintech/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/9.png) The power of blockchain and how it‚Äôs only just getting started Since the launch of Bitcoin, back in 2009, we have had proof that blockchain has the power to significantly impact a number of industries. It showed that a digital distributed ledger works in practice, not just in theory. Since then, businesses all over the world have been exploring how blockchain can work for them. Savvy [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/the-power-of-blockchain-and-how-its-only-just-getting-started/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/6.png) How the fusing of finance and technology has changed the world The rise of financial technology (fintech) may seem to be a rapid one. For those outside of the sector it appeared that, out of the blue, we suddenly had new ways of processing payments, investing in stocks, as well as challenger banks to sign up with. It‚Äôs like we‚Äôve almost seen it evolve before our [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/how-the-fusing-of-finance-and-technology-has-changed-the-world/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) How investing in fintech is joining the fight for good Having seen an exponential rise in the number of fintech companies that exist, these are now becoming the go-to institutions for those seeking access to financial products. Certainly, when looking at some of the most developed nations, such as the US and the UK, almost all financial institutions have made the switch to operating online [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/how-investing-in-fintech-is-joining-the-fight-for-good/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) A history of blockchain: the rise from complete unknown to world-changing technology It‚Äôs quite possible that you‚Äôd never even heard of blockchain even a decade ago. There is little doubt that this technology is one of the greatest innovations that the world has seen. While it is perhaps most recognised for the role that it plays with cryptocurrency, the uses of blockchain technology have spread far beyond [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/a-history-of-blockchain-the-rise-from-complete-unknown-to-world-changing-technology/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) How fintech is leading the change in relationships between consumers and banks The traditional banking system was, for far too long, the only option open to consumers and businesses. With no form of competition, apart from against each other, the banking system had a complete monopoly. With this monopoly, a couple of things crept in: complacency and laziness. Banks didn‚Äôt need to try and please customers as [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/how-fintech-is-leading-the-change-in-relationships-between-consumers-and-banks/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) How fintech and blockchain present some of the greatest investment opportunities While the title of this article may sound a little on the bold side, we truly hold the belief that the revolution unfolding before our eyes is one of the very best opportunities that has ever existed. Right now, investors are hooked on the idea of fintech and blockchain. As we go through, you‚Äôll soon [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/how-fintech-and-blockchain-present-some-of-the-greatest-investment-opportunities/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) Blockchain in business ‚Äì are you ready for the revolution? Blockchain has received some serious attention over the last decade. Having first appeared when a certain ‚ÄòSatoshi Nakamoto‚Äô published a paper entitled ‚ÄòBitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System‚Äô. Of course, here the focus was all on Bitcoin, with blockchain being the vital element to take the cryptocurrency from concept to success. While Bitcoin has moved [‚Ä¶] ](https://www.nukk.com/resources/blockchain-in-business-are-you-ready-for-the-revolution/)

# **Subscribe for Updates**
